customer_reviews.title: It’s good

The scent is the other amazing thing about this pomade, since its made with hops, it has this fresh, floral, yet manly scent that is addictive. I love the smell of my head in the morning. feature_bullets: Long Lasting Style - 90 Proof Pomade provides a strong, lasting hold that you can still run your hands through.
Matte Finish - Not for those expecting a reflection. This formula leaves hair with a no-frills, no-shine finish.

Infused with Hops - Hops are an effective conditioning and thickening agent that help create more hair volume perfect for regulating the appearance of greasy hair and flaky scalps. Look good and feel good.
Water (Not Grease) Based - No castor oil, no grease. This styling pomade is water based -- so, one rinse and it's gone.
Light Tonka Bean Scent - Infused with tonka beans, leaving hair with a semi- sweet scent that is similar to a vanilla. Smells so delicious, you might eat it...but don't.
